name: strong
features: Performance Enhancements: Designed to increase blood flow and decrease muscle vibration during the throwing motion Keeps the arm feeling “live” throughout the game
Designed to increase blood flow and decrease muscle vibration during the throwing motion
Keeps the arm feeling “live” throughout the game
Throw Harder, Longer: Graduated compression increases blood flow by dilating arteries by 40%, helping the arm feel rested & "live" for longer play
Keep Your Arm Cool: Increased blood flow helps maintain a cool and fresh feeling while playing
Reduce Injuries: Compression reduces muscle & tendon vibration, supporting the arm & reducing the potential for injuries
Faster Recovery: Helps remove lactic acid & increase blood flow & oxygen delivery, aiding recovery post-game; wear the sleeve for an hour after playing for noticeable results
